title: What are the affordable, clean hotels in Miami with breakfast included
excerpt: Finding affordable and clean hotels in Miami that include breakfast can be a daunting task, especially with the city's bustling tourism scene. This list is valuable as it highlights top options that provide comfort and convenience without breaking the bank, ensuring that your stay is both enjoyable and budget-friendly. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, these hotels help set the stage for a memorable Miami experience.
intro: Discover the best affordable hotels in Miami that offer cleanliness and complimentary breakfast, making your stay both pleasant and economical.
